testimonials.text: Jeff is an incredible Frontend Engineer. I have had the pleasure of working directly with Jeff on a number of projects and each one has been full of excellent communication and feedback on design choices and data architecture.
testimonials.author: Justin LaRose
testimonials.title: Technical Lead

testimonials.text: Jeff Vacca is an amazing front end developer. Any company would be lucky to have him. I have been working with him over the last couple years and his skills not only with software but with people are top notch.
testimonials.author: Matt Collier
testimonials.title: VP of Engineering

testimonials.text: One of Jeff's notable strengths is his ability to lead and collaborate within a team. He played a key role in several high profile projects where his leadership and communication skills were instrumental in achieving project goals.
testimonials.author: Bill Summa
testimonials.title: QA Engineer

testimonials.text: I really recommend Jeff because he is an amazing worker and teammate. Jeff works very hard and is good at what he does.
testimonials.author: Jordenys Perez
testimonials.title: Technical Lead
